Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than $10,000 to you. Considering this, I propose to sell it to you for $15,000. This price reflects not only the value of the product but also the opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at an exclusive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if there's any way I can assist you in making your decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
